snippet: An official from the Organization for the Prohibition of Chemical Weapons said Syria might not finish the job by a revised deadline of April 27, but might do so soon after.
lead_paragraph: An official from the Organization for the Prohibition of Chemical Weapons said Syria might not finish the job by a revised deadline of April 27, but might do so soon after.

headline.main: Program to Destroy Syria’s Chemical Weapons Is 75% Complete, Group Says
